ygData.subject: RE: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: i think with so many of these research items dropping regularly on the planes, it is much easier for casters to get their level 49 spells.  i remember it
ygData.messageBody:
i think with so many of these research items dropping regularly on the
planes, it is much easier for casters to get their level 49 spells. i
remember it taking months for the first 50 necro on my server to get his
level 49 pet. but runes and words are abundant in the planes now and get
passed on to friends, guildmembers, sold, etc.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L37 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Yes, FS daggers are easy to get. But getting the items so you
> can research the pet spell so that you even have a pet to give
> the daggers to is roughly as difficult as getting a haste
> item. AFAIK, except for the enchanter pets, none of the pet
> spells past about level 25 can be bought.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
